```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)

# Set this to true to have links turned into footnotes at the end of the document
PDF_EXPORT <- FALSE

# Holds all the links that were inserted for placement at the end
links <- c()

source('parsing_functions.R')


# First let's get the data, filtering to only the items tagged as
# Resume items
position_data <- read_csv('positions_KY.csv') %>% 
filter(in_resume) %>% 
  mutate(
    # Build some custom sections by collapsing others
    section = case_when(
      section %in% c('PRG_ year_up_positions', 'general_positions') ~ 'positions', 
      section %in% c('VOL_positions', 'Training_ Certifications') ~ 'PD',
      TRUE ~ section
    )
  ) 

```
